headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Exact Sciences (EXAS) After The US$105 Abbott Offer
summary: If you are wondering whether Exact Sciences at around US$103 a share still offers value, you are not alone. This article is all about putting that price tag into context. The stock has returned 0.6% over the last 7 days, 1.0% over 30 days, 1.5% year to date and 104.1% over the past year, while the 3 year return sits at 61.9% and the 5 year return at a 27.1% decline. Recently, headlines have focused on Exact Sciences as a key player in cancer screening and diagnostics, with media coverage...
